receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: Document must show the name of the vendor/merchant that provided the goods or services

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must show the date when the purchase/transaction occurred

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must display the final cost including all taxes and fees

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: Document must contain a unique invoice or receipt number for identification

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: Receipt must specify the goods or services purchased with clear description (expense type/description)

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
receiptStandards.rule: VAT amount should be clearly shown on the invoice if applicable
When working with Baldock or Parakar, the worker's name and details should appear on invoices, not the Local Employer
Invoices should show Global PPL Spain, S.L.U., Calle María de Molina, 39, 8A, 280006, Madrid
For business trips reports, if not possible to show Global People's name and address, then the employee's data should be used

receiptStandards.required_data: GoGlobal entity name on invoices over €100
receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training
receiptStandards.rule: ALL invoices and receipts over 100 euros must have GoGlobal tax number (Cif) and details

receiptStandards.required_data: GoGlobal entity name on invoices under €250
receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training
receiptStandards.rule: Invoices under EUR 250 can be in either the name of the worker or GoGlobal

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training
receiptStandards.rule: NIF/CIF & registered office of GoGlobal must appear on invoices over €100 - either B10690717 for GoGlobal IT Consulting Sociedad Limitada or B10690709 for GoGlobal Business Operations Sociedad Limitada

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Domestic business travel per diem: €53.34 per day with overnight stay, €26.67 per day without overnight stay. International business travel per diem: €91.35 per day with overnight stay, €48.08 per day without overnight stay. Any amount spent above the per diem will be taxable
All expenses will be processed via receipts and invoices instead of per diem method. Tax treatment applies based on actual expenses incurred
Per diems will not be used, instead all expenses will be processed via receipts and invoices. All expenses are subject to taxation review based on actual amounts

The current (2024) mileage rate is €0.26 per kilometer tax-free. Employers may choose to reimburse more than the above, but the higher rate per kilometer is considered taxable income for the employee and must be reported accordingly
Many business expenses related to workers completing their job will be tax exempt, providing sufficient proof is shared such as tax receipts, invoices
For travel and stay for a continuous period of more than nine months, allowances will not be exempt from taxation

When employee uses public transport, the amount of the expense must be justified by an invoice or equivalent document. Otherwise, €0.19 per kilometre travelled plus toll and parking costs that are justified

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Excel Log book & Travel expenses template must be submitted with the expense reimbursement request

Excel Log book & Travel expenses template must be submitted with the expense reimbursement request. If a different template is used it should include details of Start and End Date, Start and Destination Point, Purpose of the Trip and list all expenses

Employee must report date, starting point, end point, number of km and detail the business purpose. Screenshot/printout of the travel route using GoogleMaps or similar site required. Report must be signed both by employee and employer. Electronic signature is allowed
For trips carried out in one month and exceeding 200 euros, additional business justification required. Complete the template letter, obtain the client's signature, and provide a copy

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Receipts and invoices must be submitted with expenses. Online copies are sufficient, hard copy not required. Documents must be actual tax receipts or invoices; booking confirmations will not suffice

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission
For the purposes of travel allowances, the payer must prove the date and place of the trip, as well as the reason or motive

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Convert amount in local currency and include currency & exchange rate used for foreign currency expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Include details (date of expense, business purpose, and merchant name) with all submissions

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses must be submitted within 6 months after the date that the expense was incurred

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Client line manager must review and approve expenses before payroll cutoff date

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses submitted without itemised reports or properly labeled receipts will be rejected or delayed

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Restaurant, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Taxi, Training, Mileage
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Keep hard copies of receipts for a minimum of 4 years to ensure compliance with local tax regulations
